author: shalin
msg: SOLR-5492: Added shardAddress in grouping query responses. Added tests.

author: crossley
msg: Enable per-project configuration of Cocoon error handling.

author: robbie
msg: QPIDJMS-9: update JMSExpiration to use absolute-expiry-time or 'current time + TTL' and NOT 'creation-time + ttl' as this would incorrectly lead to an earlier-than-desired JMSExpiration value because the TTL field is mutable during transit and creation-time is not.
